title: 110 year ago : national advisory committee aeronautics founded
content: 4 min read march , , united state congress created national advisory committee aeronautics ( naca ) . although naca founding took place over 11 year after wright brother first powered flightfirst powered flight kitty hawk , north carolina , congress took action response america lagging behind world power advance aviation aeronautics . modest beginning advisory committee , over year , naca established research center test facility enabled groundbreaking advance civilian military aviation , well fledgling discipline spaceflight . creation national aeronautics space administration , new agency incorporated naca facility , employee , annual budget . naca provided nasa strong foundation set explore space . congressional action created naca , implemented rider 1915 naval appropriation bill , read part , shall duty advisory committee aeronautics supervise direct scientific study problem flight view practical solution . . initial year , naca fulfilled intended role , coordinating activity already place area aeronautics research , reporting directly president . committee , made up 12 representative government agency , academia , military , first met april 23 office secretary war washington , d.c. established nine-member executive committee oversee day-to-day operation spent first few year establishing headquarters washington . within few year , naca role began expand establishment research facility . langley memorial aeronautical laboratory , today nasa langley research center , hampton , virginia , opened june , . over next few decade , langley served testing facility new type aircraft , using wind tunnel technological advance . ames aeronautical laboratory sunnyvale , california , today nasa ames research center , opened 1940 aircraft engine research laboratory cleveland , today nasa glenn research center , . three lab achieved many breakthrough civilian military aviation before , during , after world war ii . cleveland lab , renamed lewis flight propulsion laboratory , concentrated most effort advance jet propulsion . after world war ii , naca began work achieving supersonic flight . , agency established muroc flight test unit air force muroc field , later renamed edward air force base , california mojave desert . close collaboration , naca , air force , bell aircraft developed x-1 airplane first broke sound barrier . muroc field underwent several name change , first high-speed flight station , 1976 nasa dryden , 2014 armstrong flight research center . , naca established pilotless aircraft research station wallop island , virginia , nasa wallop flight facility , test site rocketry research , under langley direction . first launch 1945 through , naca launched nearly 400 different type rocket wallop . 1950s , naca began study feasibility spaceflight , including sending human space . , naca engineer developed concept blunt body capsule most efficient way return human space . design concept found way mercury capsule future american spacecraft . following dawn space age , naca advocated take lead america spaceflight effort . congress passed , president dwight d. eisenhower signed legislation create new civilian space agency , oct. , , nasa officially began operation . new organization incorporated naca research laboratory test facility , ,000 employee , $ 100 million annual budget . many nasa key early leader engineer began career naca . naca last director , hugh dryden , served nasa first deputy administrator . more information naca transition nasa , read former nasa chief historian roger launius book nasa nasa : frontier air space american century . watch video narrated former nasa chief historian bill barry naca .

content: 2 min read celebrate 110th anniversary organization ultimately became nasa , agency released new collection video highlight history national advisory committee aeronautics ( naca ) way transformed flight over four decade . not long after beginning world war , united state congress , concerned america lagging behind country , created new committee advance nation flight technology development . march , , naca founded supervise direct scientific study problem flight , view practical solution . naca began committee 12 leader representing government , military , industry , rapidly expanded through world war ii develop america flight capability defense commercial us . organization became home nation best brightest aeronautical engineer world-class facility , transforming nasa dawn space age . new video collection highlight naca striking historic photography celebrates pioneering organization brief history formation , expansion , groundbreaking aeronautics research four center across united state current home nasa langley research center hampton virginia , ames research center california silicon valley , glenn research center cleveland , armstrong flight research center edward , california . related link national advisory committee aeronautics ( naca ) aeronautics nasa history naca oral history

title: national advisory committee aeronautics
content: elite research engineer world-class test facility , nasa predecessor , naca , nation premier aeronautical research institution over 40 year . national advisory committee aeronautics ( naca ) began 1915 unpaid advisory committee met periodically coordinate u.s. aeronautical research quickly evolved independent research institution engineer facility . over next 20 year , facility , particularly wind tunnel , became nation premier aerodynamic tool . naca metamorphosed late 1930s early 1940s multi-site organization broader scope research , larger workforce , more advanced facility . made substantial contribution supersonic flight , jet propulsion , improved flying quality . element work manifest 1960s space program . naca disbanded 1958 become foundation national aeronautics space agency ( nasa ) . aviation pioneer orville wright charter member naca 's executive committee outbreak world war , u.s. government began focusing nation technological resource , including aeronautics . up point , government largely viewed aviation diversion private citizen made minor financial investment . several european nation , however , saw potential military application invested heavily aircraft research development year leading up war . reported onset world war , france possessed ,400 airplane , germany , , russia , 23 united state . rectify situation , march , , congress added rider navy appropriation legislation established naca . -person advisory committee , consisting appointed member military , government , industry , initially met semiannually identify key aeronautical problem develop strategy resolve . organization included jerome hunsaker chairman , john victory secretary , seven-person executive committee pulled larger group . , george w. lewis became naca executive officer later named director aeronautical research . naca provided forum where opinion array stakeholder could integrated common good . representative individual company encouraged work together resolve problem big single organization . facilitate work , naca established four major subcommittee subject matter expert oversee primary field research aerodynamics , propulsion , aircraft structure , aircraft operating problem . during initial year , naca difficulty locating facility carry research work . manufacturer focused current product not interested experimental design potential future aeronautical issue ; early attempt convince university aeronautics legitimate engineering science unsuccessful . situation forced advisory group undertake research engineering work . , naca began construction research facility coastal tract land virginia . initially modest laboratory hangar , engine test stand , shop , power plant , office . john victory immediately began difficult process finding aeronautical engineer staff facility . langley memorial aeronautical laboratory began operation june 1920 four engineer , 11 technician , rudimentary wind tunnel . , however , langley over 100 employee world first pressurized wind tunnel . series increasingly complex tunnel came online ensuing year augmented steady stream aircraft flight testing . naca engineer made series key innovation , naca cowl , helped push u.s. airline industry prominence 1930s . limited budget , naca largely eschewed investment costly equipment facility required study aircraft engine focused aerodynamics , where significant advance could made more economically . organization , however , undertake intensive study aircraft operational problem stability , control , icing . , naca hosted first annual industry conference dozen guest invited langley hear latest research tour facility . meeting not showcased naca contribution aviation provided industry representative opportunity recommend future area research . hired fresh school minimum knowledge aerodynamics little practical experience kind , majority early langley researcher learned nearly everything job . , naca appointed j. jay ide serve agency technical representative europe , where documented foreign aviation interfaced european aeronautical research institution . mid-1930s , ide began reporting advance new innovative wind tunnel germany . subsequent tour german aeronautical research facility naca member charles lindberg george lewis confirmed ide report revealed emphasis propulsion preference performance over quantity . late , naca began planning new research laboratory expand upon langley capability . quickly followed plan second new laboratory dedicated engine . congress approved necessary fund ground broken ames aeronautical laboratory ( known ames research center ) sunnyvale , california december 1939 aircraft engine research laboratory ( today , nasa glenn research center ) cleveland , ohio january . nation involvement world war ii , naca deferred most research activity focused improving performance current military aircraft . most well-known example systematic drag cleanup fighter aircraft langley full scale tunnel , important work done engine cooling , turbosuperchargers , duct rumbling , synthetic fuel , icing . naca tested every type u.s. military aircraft flown during war , air superiority proved vital component allied victory . new high-speed technology emerged , however , naca found continue effort improving current aircraft initiating experimental work turbojet high-speed flight would come forefront after war . more necessary ever before give full scope research regain leadership lost field military aviation . naca emerged world war ii significantly larger organization . addition two new research laboratory , also added auxiliary facility wallop island , virginia muroc lake california , began construction third 1956 plum brook station sandusky , ohio . existing site , series new , more advanced test facility built , including unitary plan wind tunnel 1950s . during war year , number naca employee grew roughly 500 over , . annual appropriation increased $ .26 million 1938 $ 78 million . executive committee expanded , host new subcommittee created . hugh dryden took over director aeronautical research following george lewis retirement . dryden guided naca through move high-speed flight transition nasa . naca sought return pre-war focus fundamental research , leaving development industry , distinction between two become difficult discern . effort more responsive aviation industry , naca formed industry consulting committee ; reinvented annual conference elaborate , multi-day inspection rotated one laboratory another year ; introduced smaller , more focused technical conference specific topic . notable exception , icing research , naca focused high-speed flight jet propulsion post-war period . langley engineer pioneered swept-wing area rule concept . former protected aircraft shockwaves improved efficiency transonic supersonic speed . latter , indented fuselage coke bottle shape , facilitated supersonic flight . concept went employed nearly supersonic fighter . ames extended work area rule developed advanced supersonic wing model improved aircraft performance supersonic speed . cleveland laboratory , renamed lewis flight propulsion laboratory , concentrated nearly resource jet propulsion . researcher studied high-altitude combustion , thrust augmentation ( including first working afterburner ) , compressor turbine design , high-temperature material . nearly every type u.s. jet engine underwent testing simulated flight condition laboratory during period . jet engine thrust increased ,600 pound over ,000 pound few year . cold war took hold , naca received additional national security funding allowed embark upon unprecedented full-scale high-speed flight development program . time , little known condition transonic realm . langley laboratory partnered bell aircraft air force design first supersonic aircraft , x- . , naca established small station ( today , nasa armstrong flight research center ) muroc army air field california perform flight test . october , , bell x-1 became first aircraft exceed speed sound . supersonic research flight continued using d-558 skystreaks evolving stable x-planes study high-speed dynamic advanced design configuration . year , naca leader deemed space-related technology outside mandate considered missile weapon thus falling under purview military . nonetheless , engineer three laboratory found way make foray field . researcher lewis laboratory , saw rocket engine extension aeropropulsion work , constructed modest rocket test facility 1945 study combustion cooling jato rocket . soon , however , group began concentrating experimental high-energy liquid propellant . lab identification liquid hydrogen liquid oxygen optimal combination mid-1950s led utilization nasa upper-stage vehicle 1960s . spring , langley built pilotless aircraft research station wallop island . test range provided safe location launch rocket-boosted free flying model order obtain aerodynamic data transonic supersonic realm impossible acquire contemporary wind tunnel . series mercury apollo vehicle launched wallop 1960s . early 1950s , naca ames aerodynamicist harvey allen began studying thermodynamic aspect atmospheric reentry . direct contrast existing military design , allen posited reentry vehicle employ blunt nose push shock wave away body thus significantly reduce vehicle heating . blunt body theory utilized capsule mercury , gemini , apollo program . future nasa center , jet propulsion laboratory ( jpl ) , established . october , , naca secretary john victory reviewed presentation upcoming inspection held lewis laboratory . victory ordered speaker remove reference space flight talk . following launch sputnik next day overnight increase spaceflight interest , content original presentation restored . political leader argued during ensuing month over appropriate response soviet space achievement , naca underwent internal dispute over role future space program . felt remain focused aeronautics , others considered space broadening organization legacy work . langley robert gilruth advocated naca research issue surrounding human spaceflight . november , lewis laboratory bruce lundin drafted paper urging naca lead nation space program proposed new laboratory dedicated spaceflight . proposal shared hugh dryden naca leader december , , ultimately used basis naca successful january 1958 bid become national space agency . april , , president eisenhower initiated legislation would create new civilian space agency naca laboratory serving foundation . dryden brought gilruth , abe silverstein , george low others headquarters establish framework nasa initial crewed mission , project mercury . july , congress passed president eisenhower signed national aeronautics space act law . naca formally disbanded october , , laboratory became research center new national aeronautics space administration . [ naca ] approach [ space ] must obviously bold , imaginative , aggressive , visionary . occasion demand nothing less .

hampton offered position flight research division , chance train aeronautical engineer . kraft never looked back began long historic nasa career . born birmingham , alabama , annie easley 's mother told , `` anything want , work . `` later moved husband cleveland , ohio , 1955 read story newspaper naca lewis flight propulsion laboratory hiring `` computer . `` applied next day hired two week later . faced prejudice time period , adopted attitude `` ca n't work , work around . not discouraged 'd walk away . `` jack boyd always wanted go california , when friend told naca hiring laboratory , chose ames aeronautical laboratory near mountain view . two week after sending application , received telegram telling hired engineer . studied supersonic aerodynamics , supervisor put wind tunnel devise airfoil begin testing supersonic speed . simple choice moving california began 73 year long career nasa . betty love began work naca high speed flight research station california `` computer `` . later recalled , `` office like library . hum friedan calculator noise heard . no one spoke . supposed visit neighbor . supposed keep work right front . go down visit engineer . `` attained engineering position retired , betty continued support nasa volunteering preserving center 's history . after taking civil service test , jo dibella received offer temporary job adjudication section social security board moved washington , dc , june , . early , working census bureau , met someone local church concert told naca hiring secretary . landed job worked thomas neill 14 year . when title: artemis iii : nasa first human mission lunar south pole
